title: blucepheus
author: blucepheus
content: Selling a stunning loaded Casascius 2013 1 BTC Silver graded MS-66 PL by ICG. Beautiful condition with no milk spotting. https://www.blockstream.info/address/1Ag9xAkYfdrMQzVZkmGdy91ac4vPPhpRB8Asking 1.4 BTC. Pick up in Texas, or I'll ship using your method of choice. MJ for escrow, if desired. PM if interested.Full res: https://ibb.co/nLfNNYP

comments.author: SatsLife
comments.body: One of the cleanest silvers i've seen

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: Ahh, thanks gents. Yeah - this thing would regrade higher IMO.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: SatsLife on April 11, 2023, 01:35:17 PMOne of the cleanest silvers i've seen  That’s what I was thinking as well. Someone recently contacted me to see how much it would cost for me to break up my silvers set and sell them this coin from it. I told them 2.4 BTC (I think, give or take a few bits). While a 0.4 BTC premium seems like a lot, I think the day will come when you won’t be able to find one of these at any price. Albeit possibly far in the future.

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: This is art   So damn cool. What a piece of history here. You should honestly hold on to this coin man!!! I mean unless you have more of them haha. I'm sure this will go quick. Stacks bowers could sell this at auction for you and fetch a hefty sum.

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.created_time: April 14, 2023, 10:36:17 PMLast edit: April 15, 2023, 11:00:32 PM by blucepheus
comments.body: Quote from: tread93 on April 14, 2023, 06:31:58 PMThis is art   So damn cool. What a piece of history here. You should honestly hold on to this coin man!!! I mean unless you have more of them haha. I'm sure this will go quick. Stacks bowers could sell this at auction for you and fetch a hefty sum.Thank you! It is a stunning piece, without a doubt. If I didn’t have a few, this would be vaulted for the ages. Similar to the recent silver Doge CI auction I did, I like to offer things up for the community from time to time. I’d rather these stunners go to someone here than a random investor who can’t fully appreciate them.I’ve had offers at 1.25 1.3 - looking for 1.4, which is more than fair given this beauty’s condition.Cheers!

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: blucepheus on April 14, 2023, 10:36:17 PM✂️I’ve had offers at 1.25 - looking for 1.4, which is more than fair given this beauty’s condition.✂️a very nice shiny coin. i also hope that you will find a buyer soon, who will then secure this silver cas coin.i personally also own this coin. but it is graded by anacs ms-69. also the 1BTC cas gilt silver coin looks damn good...

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: blucepheus on April 11, 2023, 01:32:43 PMSelling a stunning loaded Casascius 2013 1 BTC Silver graded MS-66 PL by ICG. Beautiful condition with no milk spotting. https://www.blockstream.info/address/1Ag9xAkYfdrMQzVZkmGdy91ac4vPPhpRB8Asking 1.4 BTC. Pick up in Texas, or I'll ship using your method of choice. MJ for escrow, if desired. PM if interested.Full res: https://ibb.co/nLfNNYPStunning piece. I wish the 0.1 silver casascius would be available with only a 40% premium, but yeah, that train's long passed I guess... This one's out of my league, but my guess is it should sell easily. : )

comments.author: blucepheus
comments.body: Sold! Congrats to the buyer, and thanks to minerjones for the escrow support.
